type.description:
apoli:bonemeal
Applies bone meal to the target block as if a dispenser or a player used a Bone Meal item to it.
Block Action Types operate an action at a selected block or set of blocks. These are available to power/action types that provides a block_action object field.
type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:bonemeal`
Applies bone meal to the target block as if a dispenser or a player used a Bone Meal item to it.
## Block Action Type
Block Action Types operate an action at a selected block or set of blocks. These are available to power/action types that provides a block_action object field.

[Block Action Types Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/)

effects.description: Determines if the particle and other visual effects of the bonemeal-ing action should appear.
